action.action-desc: Mr. Brecheen (for himself and Mr. Burlison) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to require adjustments to the thrifty food plan to be budget-neutral, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Thrifty Food Plan Accountability Act of 2023.

section.header: Adjustments to the thrifty food plan in the supplemental nutrition assistance program
section.text: Section 3(u) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012(u)) is amended in the matter preceding paragraph (1) by inserting after the second sentence the following: Each re-evaluation shall be budget-neutral and adjust the cost of the diet only in accordance with paragraphs (1) through (4), as applicable..
